Item #1 on my To-Do List

Jul 26, 2012 • scottlthompson

With inspiration from Paul Graham’s The Top of My To-Do List post, I now have a fixture sitting at the top of my Google Tasks list:

PG’s list item ends with “be happy”; I added a couple reminders to myself to take care of my body, too. In this case, “Stand up” does not have a symbolic meaning like “stand up for what you believe in”, but more of a direct meaning: “literally stand up if you have been sitting for awhile – sitting kills”.
